tactics.name: Amazon Bestsellers Analysis
tactics.description: Identify trending niches by examining Amazon's bestseller categories and subcategories
steps: Drill down into subcategories like 'Activities Crafts and Games'
Analyze BSR rankings and book themes
caveats: High BSR books may be too competitive
source_quotes: Amazon is basically telling you which books are selling well

tactics.name: Keyword Niche Analysis
tactics.description: Build a list of niches and keywords using Excel/Google Docs with data from KDP Chrome extension
steps: Create manual keyword list in spreadsheet
Use KDP Chrome extension to extract niche score, results, average BSR
Analyze ad presence and book pricing data
caveats: Requires manual data entry without paid tools
source_quotes: the easiest way to have done this would have been to download the keywords here but only paid subscribers...
this is why the download of the kdp chrome research extension is important
